test_result.test_message: Generate a professional intro pitch presentation for Acme Corp, a Technology company. Key pain points: Legacy systems causing downtime, High operational costs, Need for digital transformation. Products to highlight: CloudSync Platform, AI Analytics Suite. Tone: Professional. Number of slides: 8.
test_result.notes: Agent returns an array of slide objects directly (not wrapped in standard {status, result, metadata}). Each slide has: slide_number, slide_title, subtitle (optional), bullet_points (array), speaker_notes, presentation_type, client_name, industry_vertical, key_pain_points (array), products_to_highlight (array), tone. No PPTX file/download URL was returned - agent produces structured content data for slide rendering.
